alert.note: Alert for Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 05 at 2:19PM CDT until May 06 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ROGERS AND NORTHEASTERN TULSA COUNTIES... At 219 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles east of downtown Tulsa, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Tulsa... Broken Arrow... Claremore... Owasso... Catoosa... Collinsville... Verdigris... Oologah... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 224 and 248. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
